title: Fundamentals of public speaking
brief_description: A lawyer, asked for advice after a student has made a poor platform appearance, explains the basic rules for good public speaking; analyse your subject, audience and purpose; plan your material by selecting, arranging and illustrate your speech in a direct, distinct and lively manner.
